## Projects
  
In this unit, we will focus on the topics of interest for the class projects. 
I will provide a basic overview of the topic areas, but the class will spend most of the time leading the research. Three graded assignments are associated with this section.

* Group presentation - groups of four
* Individual visualization - individually developed prototypes on the theme of the group.
* Group project - groups of four
